creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
description: black with black band around neck; red band down front; sleeves have bands of applied fabric in red, gold, light and dark blue, tan and green; three bands have geometric embroidered motifs; back has similar bands--most embroidered; one row of white buttons at bottom and partway up sides of bands; rows of white beads along entire sides of bands and around arm at top of sleeve; three squares on back yoke embroidered
title: Woman's jacket
